title: Tea Rose by Perfumer's Workshop for Women - 4 Ounce EDT Spray
description: Introduced in 1975. Fragrance notes: spicy, warm florals. Recommended use: evening.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Vanderbilt by Gloria Vanderbilt for Women - 3.3 Ounce EDT Spray
description: Introduced in 1994. Fragrance notes: carnation, mimosa, rose, and other spicy oriental florals. Recommended use: evening.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
